title: AceBetGroup
author: AceBetGroup
content: Hi guys,I suddenly lost all my btc so I need to activate an emergency plan (which will pay for my next rent)I am working on a gambling project with some childhood friends who have good affiliate marketing experience and seo ranking expertise.I would like to start with crash and need some assistance/ Stakeholders.Stakes can be swapped against:+ script providing,+ a bid in our marketing or SEOTelegram: https://t.me/bukowzki

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Turning into project startup simply because you lost your BTC, that you have your rent due in a short while is not the best of motives to drive you towards a startup. You will be under critical pressure and it will have a negative impact on the project you want to run. Nobody wants to get involved in anything that will not benefit them, from your analysis, you'll take no time to prioritize your worries over the success of your project and therefore, I'll advise you face another direction to settle your life's worries before deciding to startup a project

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: Maybe you should try to market it again after your website is running. As mentioned above, no one would even bother with you since you have no track record on this forum at all. I saw your previous posts and I personally don't think that is enough to convince people to start your new crypto project. Also, I don't think you need to spam on multiple boards just to attract interest, focus on one thread so you won't be called a spammer. Who knows, potential investors might be turned off from the way you posts.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Quote from: AceBetGroup on November 02, 2023, 09:07:09 AMI suddenly lost all my btc so I need to activate an emergency plan (which will pay for my next rent)This is the first mistake you make. How do you want people to trust you and your project when you could not keep your bitcoins? This is a very bad start for marketing your project.I don't know, maybe you lost your bitcoins in gambling and you want to create a gambling business!!  In either case, no one will trust your project, and I do not think you will get the necessary support.Therefore, I advise you to reconsider your calculations, make a fresh start, and think about solutions to your problems in a more serious way. In the end, I wish you success.

comments.author: edmundduke
comments.body: Quote from: AceBetGroup on November 02, 2023, 09:07:09 AMHi guys,I suddenly lost all my btc so I need to activate an emergency plan (which will pay for my next rent)I am working on a gambling project with some childhood friends who have good affiliate marketing experience and seo ranking expertise.I would like to start with crash and need some assistance/ Stakeholders.Stakes can be swapped against:+ script providing,+ a bid in our marketing or SEOTelegram: https://t.me/bukowzkihave to agree with others here, sounds sketchy. Also does that "suddenly" somehow involve a casino?If the marketing guys you have are so good, why not promote some other casinos affiliate plan for now and build up some funds ? Shoudlnt be hard if they are experts.

comments.author: AceBetGroup
comments.created_time: November 03, 2023, 10:51:03 AMLast edit: November 03, 2023, 11:11:13 AM by AceBetGroup
comments.body: Quote from: yhiaali3 on November 03, 2023, 03:00:23 AMQuote from: AceBetGroup on November 02, 2023, 09:07:09 AMI suddenly lost all my btc so I need to activate an emergency plan (which will pay for my next rent)This is the first mistake you make. How do you want people to trust you and your project when you could not keep your bitcoins? This is a very bad start for marketing your project.I don't know, maybe you lost your bitcoins in gambling and you want to create a gambling business!!  In either case, no one will trust your project, and I do not think you will get the necessary support.Therefore, I advise you to reconsider your calculations, make a fresh start, and think about solutions to your problems in a more serious way. In the end, I wish you success.Thanks For the remark, I Lost all my BTC after a burglary. and I kept the mnemonics in a flash drive which also suspiciously attracted the thieves attention over flat screen tvs.Alongside phones and laptops where all wallets was connected. so in short I cant even find my address at this point because i never use ftx and co. So if thats ur current security config measures, reconsider ur strategy.Anyways im not here to cry like a baby.Nobody is perfect, we all do mistakes so im mostly only open to constructive talks.About affiliation,Which plan would you recommend?What kind of income can I expect?How is it measured?Because I have rents and salaries to pay so I must use my workers skills for a profitable job.

comments.author: moneystery
comments.body: with the increasing number of gambling platforms nowadays, competition in this industry is getting tighter and ordinary ideas will not work and attract investors to be able to finance your project. moreover, your plan to build this gambling platform is an emergency plan, meaning that from the start you were not very serious about building this project, so your chances of getting money to build your project are very slim.you should have built your website and run it first, then you can market it to other people and develop it together with investors. if it's just an invitation like this, i'm pessimistic that it will work.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: AceBetGroup on November 02, 2023, 09:07:09 AMHi guys,I suddenly lost all my btc so I need to activate an emergency plan (which will pay for my next rent)I am working on a gambling project with some childhood friends who have good affiliate marketing experience and seo ranking expertise.I would like to start with crash and need some assistance/ Stakeholders.Stakes can be swapped against:+ script providing,+ a bid in our marketing or SEOTelegram: https://t.me/bukowzkiThe gambling platform that you will soon launch is because of an emergency plan and you are requesting to fund your casino, which is good for you and bad for us, we have a reason to suspect that you want to replace that loss BTC by sending you our funds in exchange for a promised casino, why do you think it will look easy that way when you cannot show us anything or proof that you are capable.You did not even mention escrow or your credentials that you really can launch a casino,but I like your honesty in telling us that you lost your BTC because of your carelessness, your honesty backfired.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Quote from: AceBetGroup on November 02, 2023, 09:07:09 AMI suddenly lost all my btc so I need to activate an emergency plan (which will pay for my next rent)You do realize that it sounds like a red alert for the potential partner? When someone is on the brink of failure, it's only a matter of time before they snap. The potential partner will look at this as if this gambling operation of yours will be the source of funds for your rent. Affiliate marketing experience and SEO skills take time before they work and in crypto casinos, they invest more in the reputation and not on whether the casino ranks above the searches because its what matters the most.

comments.author: Myleschetty
comments.body: Quote from: AceBetGroup on November 02, 2023, 09:07:09 AMHi guys,I suddenly lost all my btc so I need to activate an emergency plan (which will pay for my next rent)I am working on a gambling project with some childhood friends who have good affiliate marketing experience and seo ranking expertise.I would like to start with crash and need some assistance/ Stakeholders.Stakes can be swapped against:+ script providing,+ a bid in our marketing or SEOTelegram: https://t.me/bukowzkiFirst, making the plan to create a gambling website or casino after you lose all your BTC will give everyone the impression that you're a gambling addict who's looking for quick money to fund his lust.Second, reputable members of this forum have done the same with CasinoCritique and things never worked. From my findings, most casinos that do it successfully are already working casinos with good reputations. An example is Bustadice, and Yolodice (before they shut down).

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Quote from: AceBetGroup on November 03, 2023, 10:51:03 AMAbout affiliation,Which plan would you recommend?What kind of income can I expect?How is it measured?Because I have rents and salaries to pay so I must use my workers skills for a profitable job.You don't have to think it will be complicated because in this case you don't need to create a gambling company according to your plan, you just have to carry it out. After all, don't you have a childhood friend who has marketing experience? Ask them how to do it.Wishbyour life will be better.

comments.author: JackpotRacer
comments.body: Quote from: AceBetGroup on November 03, 2023, 10:51:03 AMQuote from: yhiaali3 on November 03, 2023, 03:00:23 AMQuote from: AceBetGroup on November 02, 2023, 09:07:09 AMI suddenly lost all my btc so I need to activate an emergency plan (which will pay for my next rent)This is the first mistake you make. In the end, I wish you success.Thanks For the remark, I Lost all my BTC after a burglary. and I kept the mnemonics in a flash drive which also suspiciously attracted the thieves attention over flat screen tvs.Alongside phones and laptops where all wallets was connected. so in short I cant even find my address at this point because i never use ftx and co. So if thats ur current security config measures, reconsider ur strategy.Anyways im not here to cry like a baby.Nobody is perfect, we all do mistakes so im mostly only open to constructive talks.About affiliation,Which plan would you recommend?What kind of income can I expect?How is it measured?Because I have rents and salaries to pay so I must use my workers skills for a profitable job.sorry that you lost all BTCwhat are you worker skills?cheers

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Quote from: AceBetGroup on November 03, 2023, 10:51:03 AMQuote from: yhiaali3 on November 03, 2023, 03:00:23 AMQuote from: AceBetGroup on November 02, 2023, 09:07:09 AMI suddenly lost all my btc so I need to activate an emergency plan (which will pay for my next rent)....About affiliation,Which plan would you recommend?What kind of income can I expect?How is it measured?Because I have rents and salaries to pay so I must use my workers skills for a profitable job.Sorry for you, I do not have a specific plan for you because I do not know what skills you possess. Determining the plan depends primarily on the skills and experiences that you possess.If you do not have money to start your own project, you need partners to support you with money, but you first need to convince them that you have sufficient skill and experience to implement profitable projects.Otherwise, you can search for existing projects and offer your services in exchange for money by promoting these projects or presenting some new ideas.

comments.author: pinggoki
comments.body: Quote from: wallet4bitcoin on November 02, 2023, 01:34:55 PMTurning into project startup simply because you lost your BTC, that you have your rent due in a short while is not the best of motives to drive you towards a startup. You will be under critical pressure and it will have a negative impact on the project you want to run. Nobody wants to get involved in anything that will not benefit them, from your analysis, you'll take no time to prioritize your worries over the success of your project and therefore, I'll advise you face another direction to settle your life's worries before deciding to startup a project Well duh, that's because OP is under pressure that he's desperate now to find a way to make some money in the hopes that he can pay the rent although I am skeptic about this project although I am skeptic it being a real thing, I disagree with your claim that this kind of thing is going to be problematic for any project startup because I think that in these desperate times, that's when the drive is much stronger.And to OP, answer the questions that the others have asked, tell them your skillset or better yet, show your portfolio that you are a real deal and that all of this is a real project, prove my doubts to be wrong and hopefully you can find the people that's going to help you with your project.

comments.author: Veggamattic
comments.body: The righteous douchebag count in this thread is suffocating. The guy has an idea and doesn't need righteous critique.

comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: Quote from: Veggamattic on November 15, 2023, 05:03:51 PMThe righteous douchebag count in this thread is suffocating. The guy has an idea and doesn't need righteous critique.No, I think you are wrong. Every potential investor should analyze each proposal and then give their opinion based on their analysis. The fact of the matter is this... the guy lost his own coins, so potential investors will question his ability to secure their coins. OP, do not have enough money to pay his next rent, so how will investors be reimbursed, if something goes wrong with this project. The fact that he is renting is also a problem, because that says he owns no fixed property (asset) that can be sold to reimburse people. We also know Telegram is a scammers paradise, so only giving one communication option through a platform like Telegram are also questionable. (Most legit businessmen have a transparent social media presence, where people can put a face to a real identity)  Due diligence and questioning of people's intentions are just part of the whole process to fund projects like this.    Go watch the Series "Shark Tank" and you will see how this works.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Quote from: Veggamattic on November 15, 2023, 05:03:51 PMThe righteous douchebag count in this thread is suffocating. The guy has an idea and doesn't need righteous critique.This guy just lost all of his BTC. How can the operation be expected to have any reasonable security and/or liquidity?You have to do due diligence before starting or joining a gambling operation. I once saw a prospective casino founder gamble away the site's entire bankroll on US elections while the team was still building the platform. There was no shared custody, and the team was rightfully pissed as they had no knowledge of this.

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: AceBetGroup on November 02, 2023, 09:07:09 AMHi guys,I suddenly lost all my btc so I need to activate an emergency plan (which will pay for my next rent)I am working on a gambling project with some childhood friends who have good affiliate marketing experience and seo ranking expertise.I would like to start with crash and need some assistance/ Stakeholders.Stakes can be swapped against:+ script providing,+ a bid in our marketing or SEOTelegram: https://t.me/bukowzkiYes, you suddenly lost all your bitcoins and now what first thing comes up in your mind is to come up with a plan where people can invest with you as a shareholder to your own gambling project, you will recover your lost funds with people investing money with you and those stakeholders who invested in your crash gambling project will actually end up on the losing side.Seems like you think that you are the most intelligent person on earth and other people reading your post are just dumb and will jump in your emergency investment programme. Better understand that if your intention is to get yourself relief by hurting other people, you will never be able to succeed and you will remain as a loser.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: The fact that you need rent to be paid is the major reason why you want to look into a project on casino. This put the investors at great risk as management is not in place as well as profit making. If one can resolve to this cheap thought then the casino space is now considered a threat to incoming investors who have no idea whats coming for them.

comments.author: Manny@11111
comments.body: Failing in a business and immediately want to start another is a turn off. Starting a new entails so many things and until those factors are guaranteed you can dabble into it.Will advice you start first then when people sees your programs they can invest in it
